resource.extDbName: Sanger L. mexicana contigs and chromosomes
resource.extDbRlsDescrip: Sanger L. mexicana contigs and chromosomes|2009-11-03
resource.description: This resource includes chromosome and unassigned contig sequences for L.mexicana obtained from the Pathogen Sequencing Unit at the Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute. Please visit GeneDB for project details and data release policies.

resource.extDbName: Sanger L. mexicana contigs and chromosomes
resource.extDbRlsDescrip: Sanger L. mexicana contigs and chromosomes|2009-11-03
resource.description: Contig sequences for L.mexicana obtained from the Pathogen Sequencing Unit at the Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute. Please visit GeneDB for project details and data release policies.

resource.extDbName: Sanger L. mexicana contigs and chromosomes
resource.extDbRlsDescrip: Sanger L. mexicana contigs and chromosomes|2009-11-03
resource.pluginArgs: --extDbName %EXT_DB_NAME% --extDbRlsVer %EXT_DB_RLS_VER% --mapFile @gusHome@/lib/xml/isf/TriTrypDB/TrypEmbl2gus.xml --inputFileOrDir @downloadDir@/L.mexicana_Annotations/Chromosomes --fileFormat embl --inputFileExtension embl --soCvsVersion @soVer@ --defaultOrganism "Leishmania mexicana mexicana" --naSequenceSubclass ExternalNASequence --seqIdColumn source_id --validationLog @pipelineDir@/logs/Lmexicana.validation.log --bioperlTreeOutput @pipelineDir@/logs/Lmexicana.bioperl --handlerExternalDbs "enzyme:enzymeDB:2009-08-12"
resource.description: Genome and annotations for L. mexicana obtained from the Pathogen Sequencing Unit at the Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute
